cols.description: The maximum amount of columns that should be shown in wide viewports.
The maximum amount of columns that should be shown in wide viewports.

preview.description: This setting only applies to the preview in the Visual Editor. Which content will be served is determined in the frontend.

header_auto_nav.description: If this option is enabled, up to five stories from your content root folder are automatically displayed (in the same order).

header_auto_nav_folder.description: Provide the name of any top-level folder. If no folder is defined, the root folder is used.
